comments.author: radish
comments.content: Hmm, the macro biotic place sounds great -- but are beets ok in macro biotic diet? I read somewhere that they're not.. there's a great macro biotic place my bf and i like to go to in NYC and i noticed they didn't have beets, potatoes or tomatoes among other things... next time i'm in LA i'll have to check this place out - i LOVE beets!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Yeah, that is a good question. I had the sense that they didn't hew to a really strict macrobiotic diet, but more that they were sure to offer lots of whole grains and some solid macrobiotic choices. But then again, my last real exposure to macrobiotics was 23 years ago, so I probably have forgotten a lot! Search for "Michio Kushi" if you want to learn more about it...
